reviewText: Bad day? Got dumped? Evicted?  Fired? Whatever the challenge, watching Plympton's neurotic, codependent dog will drastically improve your mood. It's gotta be better than drugs!
I really enjoy the Bill Plympton's Dog Days. Great DVD if you LOVE animation and especially Bill Plympton. Funny as heck.
I've been a fan of Bill Plympton all my life, and I'm convinced that this collection features his best work.

I love it! :)
I have never seen such a creative animations!
Keep up with the great job Bill!

I had known of Bill Plympton years ago, having seen the Tune broadcast on a cable network. What I wasn't prepared for was Bill in person at the 2009 San Diego Comicon. After perusing through his books and several of his other DVD's, I was convinced of two things; his imagination has taken over him completely, and the guy is a certifiable genius as an animator. Nothing more needs to be said. Oh yes, one more thing, I was so impressed, I bought one of his color pieces for my home, and have the intention to buy more, hell, I'll probably paper my walls with them!
Bill Plympton to me is up there with the best of the best animators and story teller of all cartoons! watch and agree.
